00019 #include <boost/type_traits/add_const.hpp>

00021 #include <boost/array.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/range.hpp>

00027 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/crtp.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/unwrap/range.hpp>

00033 namespace boost{
00034 namespace assign{
00035 namespace v2{
00036 namespace ref{
00037 namespace static_array_aux{
00038 
00039     template<std::size_t N, typename Tag, typename T>
00040     struct interface_traits{
00041     
00042         typedef Tag assign_tag_;
00043         typedef typename ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,T> wrapper_;
00044         typedef boost::array<wrapper_,N> impl_;
00045                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<impl_>::type range_;
00046                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<
00047                 impl_ const>::type range_c_;
00048         
00049         typedef typename boost::unwrap_reference<T>::type value_type;
00050                 typedef typename boost::add_reference<value_type>::type reference;
00051         typedef typename boost::call_traits<reference>::const_reference 
00052                 const_reference;
00053         typedef typename boost::range_iterator<range_>::type iterator;
00054         typedef typename boost::range_iterator<range_c_>::type const_iterator;
00055         // wrappers
00056         #ifndef BOOST_MSVC
00057                     typedef typename boost::range_size<impl_>::type size_type;
00058         #endif
00059         #ifdef BOOST_MSVC 
00060             typedef std::size_t size_type; 
00061         #endif
00062         typedef typename boost::range_difference<range_>::type difference_type;
00063 
00064     };
00065                    
00066     // Requirements: 
00067     // D.impl()                         Returns an array of ref-wrappers
00068     // D.impl()const            Returns a const array of ref-wrappers
00069     template<std::size_t N, typename Tag, typename T, typename D>
00070     class interface 
00071       :  public relational_op_aux::crtp<
00072                 interface<N, Tag, T, D>
00073         >
00074     {
00075     
00076         typedef interface_traits<N, Tag, T> traits_;
00077         typedef typename traits_::wrapper_ wrapper_;
00078         typedef typename traits_::impl_ impl_;
00079         typedef interface<N, T, Tag, D> this_;
00080 
00081                 typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type lvalue_;
00082                 typedef typename boost::add_const<T>::type rvalue_;
00083 
00084         public:
00085         typedef wrapper_ wrapper_type;
00086         typedef typename traits_::value_type value_type;
00087         typedef typename traits_::iterator iterator;
00088         typedef typename traits_::const_iterator const_iterator;
00089         typedef typename traits_::size_type size_type;
00090         typedef typename traits_::difference_type difference_type;
00091         typedef typename traits_::reference reference;
00092         typedef typename traits_::const_reference const_reference;
00093                 
00094         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(size_type, static_size = N);
00095                                             
00096         iterator begin() 
00097         { 
00098                 return boost::begin( this->unwrap() ); 
00099         }
00100         iterator end() 
00101         { 
00102                 return boost::end( this->unwrap() ); 
00103         }
00104         const_iterator begin()const 
00105         { 
00106                 return boost::begin( this->unwrap() ); 
00107         }
00108         const_iterator end()const 
00109         { 
00110                 return boost::end( this->unwrap() ); 
00111         }
00112 
00113         size_type size() const
00114         { 
00115                 return this->impl().size(); 
00116         }
00117         bool empty() const
00118         { 
00119                 return this->impl().empty(); 
00120         }
00121                 
00122                 wrapper_& get_wrapper(size_type i)
00123         {
00124                 return (this->impl())[i];
00125         }
00126 
00127                 wrapper_ const& get_wrapper(size_type i)const
00128         {
00129                 return (this->impl())[i];
00130         }
00131                 
00132         reference operator[](size_type i)
00133         { 
00134                 return (this->impl())[i].unwrap(); 
00135         }
00136         const_reference operator[](size_type i)const
00137         { 
00138              return (this->impl())[i].unwrap(); 
00139         }
00140                         
00141         reference front()
00142         { 
00143                 return (this->impl()).front().unwrap(); 
00144         }
00145         const_reference front() const
00146         { 
00147                 return (this->impl()).front().unwrap(); 
00148         }
00149         reference back()
00150         { 
00151                 return (this->impl()).back().unwrap(); 
00152         }
00153         const_reference back() const
00154         { 
00155                 return (this->impl()).back().unwrap(); 
00156         }
00157         
00158         void swap(interface& other)
00159         { 
00160             typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> int_n_;
00161             this->swap_impl(other,int_n_());
00162         }
00163 
00164         void assign(lvalue_& val){ this->assign_impl<lvalue_>( val ); }
00165         void assign(rvalue_& val){ this->assign_impl<rvalue_>( val ); }
00166 
00167                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CONVERT_CONVERT_MF
00168                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CONVERT_OPERATOR_MF
00169 
00170         // Relational op
00171 
00172                 template<typename R>
00173         bool equal_to(const R& r)const{
00174                 return ::boost::iterator_range_detail::equal( 
00175                 (*this), r );
00176                 }
00177 
00178                 template<typename R>
00179         bool less_than(const R& r)const{
00180                 return ::boost::iterator_range_detail::less_than( 
00181                 (*this), r );
00182                 }
00183 
00184         protected:
00185         typedef boost::mpl::false_ false_;
00186         typedef boost::mpl::true_ true_;
00187 
00188         void swap_impl(interface& other, boost::mpl::int_<0>){}
00189 
00190         template<int N1>
00191         void swap_impl(interface& other, boost::mpl::int_<N1>)
00192         {
00193             reference lhs = (*this)[N1-1];
00194             reference rhs = (other)[N1-1];
00195             lhs.swap(rhs); 
00196             typedef boost::mpl::int_<N1-1> next_int_;
00197             this->swap_impl( other, next_int_() );
00198         }
00199         
00200         typename traits_::range_ unwrap()
00201         { 
00202                 return ref::unwrap_range( this->impl() ); 
00203         }
00204         typename traits_::range_c_ unwrap()const{       
00205                 return ref::unwrap_range( this->impl() ); 
00206         }
00207         
00208         impl_& impl(){ 
00209             return static_cast<D&>(*this).impl();
00210         }
00211 
00212         impl_ const& impl()const{ 
00213             return static_cast<const D&>(*this).impl();
00214         }
00215 
00216                 template<typename U>
00217         void assign_impl(U& val)
00218         { 
00219             impl_& ra = this->impl();
00220             boost::for_each(
00221                 ra, 
00222                 functional::assigner<U>( val )
00223             );
00224         }
00225 
00226     };
00227 
00228 }// static_array_aux
